tasks.title: **Upgrade** Centralize analytics ingest: write summarized metrics into `education_central.db` when a
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Centralize analytics ingest: write summarized metrics into `education_central.db` when apps save results; stop dashboard queries from reaching directly into per-app DBs.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Replace hard-coded hosts/ports (`100.112.58.92`, etc.) with env/config plus `url_for`, a
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Replace hard-coded hosts/ports (`100.112.58.92`, etc.) with env/config plus `url_for`, and surface one config object used by templates/JS.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Propagate authenticated users: when Google OAuth completes, create/sync the user across
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Propagate authenticated users: when Google OAuth completes, create/sync the user across per-app DBs and store a shared cookie/session so apps can attribute results.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Persist user identity consistently: reuse the unified session (or a shared cookie) inste
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Persist user identity consistently: reuse the unified session (or a shared cookie) instead of regenerating a random secret per process that invalidates sessions.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Store question/answer detail in a normalized form and surface remediation suggestions fo
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Store question/answer detail in a normalized form and surface remediation suggestions for missed fact families in the UI.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Capture per-note timing and mistakes as a first-class table to enable analytics and feed
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Capture per-note timing and mistakes as a first-class table to enable analytics and feedback in the dashboard.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Wire apps to the MCP layer (`/mcp`): use `POST /mcp/users` and `POST /mcp/skill-events`
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Wire apps to the MCP layer (`/mcp`): use `POST /mcp/users` and `POST /mcp/skill-events` instead of per-app direct DB writes; expose content catalogs via `mcp/content`.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Harden process launcher (`app_launcher.py`/`main_app.py`): stream stdout/stderr or log t
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Harden process launcher (`app_launcher.py`/`main_app.py`): stream stdout/stderr or log to files, poll health (URL + process), and fail fast on crashes.

tasks.title: **Fix** Serve templates without string-munging: render via blueprints with correct `static_url_path`
tasks.description: **Fix** Serve templates without string-munging: render via blueprints with correct `static_url_path`/`url_for` instead of rewriting HTML in `unified_app.py`.

tasks.title: **Fix** Dashboard template/static resolution in `unified_app.py` to consistently load from `dashboar
tasks.description: **Fix** Dashboard template/static resolution in `unified_app.py` to consistently load from `dashboard_templates/` with `/dashboard_static` paths.

tasks.title: **Fix** Central DB schema drift: align `education_central.db` initialization between `unified_app.py
tasks.description: **Fix** Central DB schema drift: align `education_central.db` initialization between `unified_app.py` and `dashboard.py` (metrics, goals, achievements, etc.) and run a single init path on startup.

tasks.title: **Fix** Anchor DB path to the module directory to avoid creating stray `typing.db` files when runnin
tasks.description: **Fix** Anchor DB path to the module directory to avoid creating stray `typing.db` files when running from the repo root.

tasks.title: **Fix** Align math schema/file (`math/math_practice.db`) used by `math/app.py`, `unified_app.py` `/m
tasks.description: **Fix** Align math schema/file (`math/math_practice.db`) used by `math/app.py`, `unified_app.py` `/math/api/save_session`, and dashboard analytics; reconcile field naming (`mode` vs `operation`) and detail tables.

tasks.title: **Fix** Create/use the questions detail table expected by `unified_app.py` (currently writes to `que
tasks.description: **Fix** Create/use the questions detail table expected by `unified_app.py` (currently writes to `questions` but the app ships `question_history`), or rewire to the existing table.

tasks.title: **Fix** Resolve session defaulting: index route hard-codes `user_id = 1`; look up/create the guest u
tasks.description: **Fix** Resolve session defaulting: index route hard-codes `user_id = 1`; look up/create the guest user ID instead of assuming the row exists.

tasks.title: **Fix** Move `/reading/api/*` endpoints onto the blueprint used by the unified server so per-app and
tasks.description: **Fix** Move `/reading/api/*` endpoints onto the blueprint used by the unified server so per-app and unified routes match; ensure `application.db` path anchors to the app directory.

tasks.title: **Fix** Mount `/piano/api/*` on the blueprint used by `unified_app.py`, and anchor `piano.db` to the
tasks.description: **Fix** Mount `/piano/api/*` on the blueprint used by `unified_app.py`, and anchor `piano.db` to the module directory to prevent duplicate DB files (unified server currently points at `piano_memory.db`).

tasks.description: **Fix** Serve templates without string-munging: render via blueprints with correct `static_url_path`/`url_for` instead of rewriting HTML in `unified_app.py`.

tasks.description: **Fix** Dashboard template/static resolution in `unified_app.py` to consistently load from `dashboard_templates/` with `/dashboard_static` paths.

tasks.description: **Fix** Central DB schema drift: align `education_central.db` initialization between `unified_app.py` and `dashboard.py` (metrics, goals, achievements, etc.) and run a single init path on startup.

tasks.description: **Fix** Align math schema/file (`math/math_practice.db`) used by `math/app.py`, `unified_app.py` `/math/api/save_session`, and dashboard analytics; reconcile field naming (`mode` vs `operation`) and detail tables.

tasks.description: **Test** Form validation: ensure required fields show errors, invalid inputs are rejected, and success states display properly.
